name: Green Island (itch)
description:
Gather resources, hire more workers and develop your own island in Green Island!

Main game features:

  • Gardening, fishing, animal breeding and more!
    • Develop your island by planting trees, catching fish, collecting honey from bees and many more
  • Nice pixel-art graphics!
    • 16x16 pixel-art graphics with juicy color palettes
  • Level system and unlockables!
    • Each level you will unlock more and more new features and structures

Plans for game:

  • Music
  • Buying land feature
  • Renaming workers
